articles.description: Hong Chau looked incredible as she attended the 95th Annual Academy Awards in a pink gown. Her sleeveless pale blush ensemble boasted a mock neck and a long train made of shiny black fringe.
articles.content:
Best Costume Design
Mary Zophres - Babylon
Ruth E. Carter - Black Panther: Wakanda Forever - WINNER
Catherine Martin - Elvis
Shirley Kurata - Everything Everywhere All at Once

articles.title: Jay Ellis on Tom Cruise Missing Top Gun: Maverick at the Oscars! (Exclusive) - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Jay Ellis and Charles Parnell chat with ET’s Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner at the 95th Academy Awards. The 'Top Gun: Maverick' stars react to Tom Cruise...

articles.author: Gabi Stevenson
articles.title: Jenna Ortega hoped people wouldn't pay attention to 'Wednesday' dance - Insider
articles.description: "I don't think people are naturally designed to have that many eyes on them," Ortega told the Times of London Saturday.
articles.content:
Jenna Ortega said she hoped her now-viral dance scene from "Wednesday" would go unnoticed.
In an interview with the Times of London's Polly Vernon published Saturday, Ortega talked about the Netflix… [+1869 chars]

articles.author: Christine Rendon, Amy Lamare
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra 'cried' to husband Nick Jonas after she was told she wasn't 'sample-sized' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking at SXSW, Chopra said she 'cried' to her husband Nick Jonas after being on the receiving end of body shaming comments.
articles.content:
Priyanka Chopra reveals how she was reduced to tears after being told she was not a 'sample sized.'
